projects.title: SanskritGPT
projects.tagline: Building a Sanskrit Language Model from scratch using Diffusion + Transformers
projects.description: A masked diffusion-based language model designed specifically for Sanskrit text generation, focusing on semantic denoising rather than next-token prediction.
projects.techStack: Python · PyTorch · Transformers · Diffusion Models · NLP

projects.title: FINAgent
projects.description: A modular AI-driven financial analyst system that combines market data, agents, memory, and orchestration graphs.

projects.title: Nexus AI
projects.tagline: Autonomous Agent Swarm for Enterprise Workflow
projects.description: A distributed swarm of AI agents that monitor system health, suggest optimizations, and autonomously deploy patches to infrastructure.

projects.title: Video Pipeline
projects.description: An automated video pipeline that downloads raw videos, transcodes them into multiple resolutions, encrypts segments, and delivers them via HLS.
projects.techStack: Node.js · Docker · AWS · FFMPEG · HLS · C++

projects.title: Remote Desktop & File Sharing System
projects.tagline: Secure multi-client remote desktop with real-time file sharing
projects.description: A secure remote desktop application supporting multiple concurrent users with real-time screen sharing, file transfer, and chat.
projects.techStack: C++ · Networking · Redis · RDP · Systems Programming

projects.title: Reverse Proxy Web Server
projects.tagline: Custom reverse proxy with WebSocket routing and security filtering
projects.description: A high-performance reverse proxy built using Spring Boot to forward HTTP and WebSocket traffic.

projects.description: A deep learning pipeline that transforms hand-drawn sketches into photorealistic faces.

projects.description: A secure Node.js authentication library providing MFA, OAuth, JWT, and RBAC.
